text: Yakhana tini kamarara bhetare namaye damriyechilena, takhana pheresatara tamke deke balalena ye, allaha tomake susambada dicchena iyaha'iya samparke, yini saksya debena allahara nirdesera satyata samparke, yini neta habena ebam naridera sansparse yabena na, tini atyanta satkarmasila nabi habena.
